sentences.sContent: King Vajiralongkorn's coronation will take place at some point after that.
sentences.sContent_eng: King Vajiralongkorn's coronation will take place at some point after that.
sentences.sCn: 哇集拉隆功国王的加冕礼将放在那之后。

sentences.sContent: Other web users identified the painting as being Catherine II the Great, Empress of Russia, with diadem and coronation robe.
sentences.sContent_eng: Other web users identified the painting as being Catherine II the Great, Empress of Russia, with diadem and coronation robe.
sentences.sCn: 有网友认出了这幅画像其实是俄国女皇叶卡捷琳娜二世，画中她戴着皇冠，身着加冕礼袍。

sentences.sContent: When they first saw each other in royal clothing, the fine robes and shining crowns for their coronation, that was when they fell in love.
sentences.sContent_eng: When they first saw each other in royal clothing, the fine robes and shining crowns for their coronation, that was when they fell in love.
sentences.sCn: 当他们第一次看到对方穿着王室的衣服——为他们的加冕礼而穿戴的精美的袍子和华丽的王冠——时，那就是他们坠入爱河的时候。

trans.tranOther: the ceremony at which someone is officially made king or queen
